doGet(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class xinxat.server.Roster
Returns the presence of every user when sending a request to: http://projecte-xinxat.appspot.com/roster GET user={username} : gets the presence of an specific user GET room={roomname} : gets the presence for all the users in the room GET : will output all the presences
doGet(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class xinxat.server.Server
This servlet outputs the pending messages still on the stack and also sets the presence In order to receive the messages the user must send a GET request to the following URL: http://projecte-xinxat.appspot.com/messages status: contains the status message (optional) show: contains one of the following: chat, dnd, away, offline (optional) to: contains the requestor's username token: contains the token given by the frontend
doGet(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class xinxat.server.UpdateDB
Syncronizes the database from the frontend and the backend
doGet(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class xinxat.server.UpdateRooms
This method allows the syncronization of the rooms between the frontend and the backend
doPost(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class xinxat.server.echoServer
 
doPost(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class xinxat.server.Server
This Servlet receives all the messages and puts them on the stack.
doPost(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class xinxat.server.UpdateDB
This method is able to delete all the users from the datastore or a single user depending on the parameters: POST all=true deletes all the users POST delete={username} deletes {username} from the datastore
doPost(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class xinxat.server.UpdateRooms
This method allows the reset of all the rooms by POSTing with the following parameters: destroy=yes
